popular_creators.name: Jamie Oliver
popular_creators.bio: British chef and restaurateur, known for his approachable cuisine and food-focused television shows

popular_creators.name: Ina Garten
popular_creators.bio: American author and host of the Food Network program Barefoot Contessa

popular_creators.name: Yotam Ottolenghi
popular_creators.bio: Israeli-British chef, restaurant owner, and food writer known for his Middle Eastern flavors

popular_creators.name: Nigella Lawson
popular_creators.bio: British food writer, journalist and broadcaster, known for her indulgent approach to food

popular_creators.name: Gordon Ramsay
popular_creators.bio: British chef, restaurateur, writer, and television personality, known for his fiery temper and Michelin-starred restaurants

popular_creators.name: Massimo Bottura
popular_creators.bio: Italian restaurateur and chef patron of Osteria Francescana, a three-Michelin-star restaurant

popular_creators.name: Samin Nosrat
popular_creators.bio: American chef, TV host and food writer, known for her book 'Salt Fat Acid Heat'

popular_creators.name: Alain Ducasse
popular_creators.bio: Monégasque chef with 21 Michelin stars, known for his innovative and influential cuisine

popular_creators.name: Donna Hay
popular_creators.bio: Australian food stylist, author, and magazine editor known for her simple and stylish approach to food

popular_creators.name: David Chang
popular_creators.bio: American restaurateur, author, and television personality, founder of the Momofuku restaurant group
